# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Boundary_plot)

ADD_PLOT_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(Boundary)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
BoundaryPluginInfo.C
BoundaryCommonPluginInfo.C
BoundaryAttributes.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
BoundaryPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBG_SOURCES
BoundaryGUIPluginInfo.C
QvisBoundaryPlotWindow.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)
SET(LIBG_MOC_SOURCES
QvisBoundaryPlotWindow.h
)

SET(LIBV_SOURCES
BoundaryViewerEnginePluginInfo.C
BoundaryViewerPluginInfo.C
avtBoundaryPlot.C
avtBoundaryFilter.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
BoundaryViewerEnginePluginInfo.C
BoundaryEnginePluginInfo.C
avtBoundaryPlot.C
avtBoundaryFilter.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)


INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_PLOT_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IBoundaryPlot ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IBoundaryPlot visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IBoundaryPlot)

IF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    QT_WRAP_CPP(GBoundaryPlot LIBG_SOURCES ${LIBG_MOC_SOURCES})
    ADD_LIBRARY(GBoundaryPlot ${LIBG_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(GBoundaryPlot visitcommon gui )

    ADD_LIBRARY(VBoundaryPlot ${LIBV_SOURCES})
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(VBoundaryPlot VIEWER)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(VBoundaryPlot visitcommon viewer )

    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} GBoundaryPlot VBoundaryPlot)

    IF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)
        SET(LIBS_SOURCES
            BoundaryScriptingPluginInfo.C
            PyBoundaryAttributes.C
            ${COMMON_SOURCES}
        )
        ADD_LIBRARY(SBoundaryPlot ${LIBS_SOURCES})
        IF(WIN32)
            # This prevents python from #defining snprintf as _snprintf
            SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(SBoundaryPlot PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS HAVE_SNPRINTF)
        ENDIF()
        TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(SBoundaryPlot visitcommon visitpy ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
        SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} SBoundaryPlot)
    ENDIF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)

    IF(VISIT_JAVA)
        FILE(COPY BoundaryAttributes.java DESTINATION ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR}/src/plots)
        ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(JavaBoundary ALL ${Java_JAVAC_EXECUTABLE} ${VISIT_Java_FLAGS} -d ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} -classpath ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} -sourcepath ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} BoundaryAttributes.java
            DEPENDS JavaClient
            WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
    ENDIF(VISIT_JAVA)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EBoundaryPlot_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EBoundaryPlot_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtplotter_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EBoundaryPlot_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EBoundaryPlot_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EBoundaryPlot_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EBoundaryPlot_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtplotter_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EBoundaryPlot_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EBoundaryPlot_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_PLOT_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(plots ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(plots Boundary ${INSTALLTARGETS})
